distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for python-requests fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-18074: Fixed to prevent the package to send an HTTP Authorization header to an http URI
  upon receiving a same-hostname https-to-http redirect. (bsc#1111622)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The Requests package before 2.20.0 for Python sends an HTTP Authorization header to an http URI upon receiving a same-hostname https-to-http redirect, which makes it easier for remote attackers to discover credentials by sniffing the network.
notes.title: CVE description
